newsitem.title: USA: Score Board names James Dole to board.
newsitem.headline: Score Board names James Dole to board.

text.p: Score Board Inc said on Friday that it named James Dole to its board of directors, increasing the number of board members to six.
Dole, the vice president for long distance business development of Frontier Corp, was appointed to the board under the terms of the prepaid phone card agreement between Frontier and Score Board.
Score Board markets sports and entertainment-related products.
